subject: RE: Patient Transport Service VSOS Page

full_threads.body: +15mins added to harvest

Hi Allie, 

Great news, the https://vsos.com.au/our-team is now functioning as intended. 

Please review and let us know if there are any further tweaks.

@chris @jaime

All good now on this one.
+5mins Thanks!
@joel are able to identify why the 'emergency veterinarians' tag isn't working on page: https://vsos.com.au/our-team/

Hello @chris 

I've inspected the team page, and I see that all the data for the emergency veterinarian team is present. However, it's not displaying on the frontend as it should. It seems to be using a template called 'Team,' and I suspect there might be an issue within the team file template. Joel is the one with access to this, and I believe we may need his assistance on this matter.

Thank you.
@jaime can you please investigate why the 'emergency veterinarians' tag isn't working on page: https://vsos.com.au/our-team/

Thank you so much.

Appreciate your help in this!

One other thing I've noticed on the "our team" page which I had updated not too long ago is that the tags for the different departments don't work or have stopped working since I made some changes. So they work when you click on all the departments separately except they don't work for Emergency Veterinarians. Could you take a look at that as well as I may have messed something up when I was tagging everyone to the correct department?

Thank you in advance!

Kind regards,

Allie

Allie Loomis​



Veterinary
Specialists of Sydney

Relationship Coordinator

+15 mins added to harvest

Hi Allie,

Thanks for the email. Confirming we have updated page: https://vsos.com.au/vsos-specialist-animal-hospital/

The old page: https://vsos.com.au/hospital-patient-transport-service/ has been reverted to draft and a redirect put in place for any visitors that have saved the link.

Hi @chris updates completed

✅ It looks like this page has not been updated to display the new Patient Transport information? https://vsos.com.au/vsos-specialist-animal-hospital/

✅ Could you please update and make sure that the old patient transport page is no longer able to be found on the website in any other sections?

✅ I would also like to move the patient transport as a service under "I'm a VET" section instead of under Hospital… can this be swapped as well? It can be its own tab listed under "im a vet"
Page: https://vsos.com.au/vets/


Time: +15mins
@jaime can you please review and action Allie's request? thanks!

Hi team,

It looks like this page has not been updated to display the new Patient Transport information? https://vsos.com.au/vsos-specialist-animal-hospital/

Could you please update and make sure that the old patient transport page is no longer able to be found on the website in any other sections?

I would also like to move the patient transport as a service under "I'm a VET" section instead of under Hospital… can this be swapped as well? It can be its own tab listed under "im a vet"

Thank you so much for your assistance!

Allie

Great news, the page is now live and you can see it here: https://vsos.com.au/vsos-veterinary-transport-service/

The old page has been reverted to a draft.

https://vsos.com.au/vsos-veterinary-transport-service/

PLEASE NOTE: customer has requested we live the draft page, and revert the old page to draft as a reference point.

Cheers,

@ricaR over to you for tracking additional updates.

Hi Allie, 

Of course, we're standing by for all future updates. 

Also confirming we have updated the mobile view, you can review it here: https://vsos.com.au/vsos-veterinary-transport-service-draft/

There is 1 hour of support remaining for the month of October.
@jaime thanks, looking great.

Hi @chris done updating mobile view

Image and text


Buttons


Time: +15mins

@jaime can you please check the mobile view of the page in question?

https://vsos.com.au/vsos-veterinary-transport-service-draft/

Hey Chris!

Thanks for that. I think there may be a few other updates to the forms to come but I will wait to do those changes

Could you please let me know how much time we have left for the month for your services?

Last thing, the mobile version looks a little funny for the first section? Can we just move the photo below the text or above so it's not in split like this cuz I don't think it looks great.
And then the spacing for the two buttons for the forms look funny on mobile as well. Anything we can do to maybe just out these stacked on top of each other so the text isn't stacked?? Does that make sense? Just more mobile friendly ?

Thank you!

Allie Loomis
